name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **SRE**, **DevOps**, and **CD/CI** practices. Proficient in managing **Linux** environments, implementing automation with **Ansible** and **Chef**, and skilled in building robust networking solutions. Experienced with cloud technologies, leveraging **AWS** and **Azure** for cloud-native system deployments, and adept in container orchestration using **Kubernetes** and **OpenShift**. 

Strong programming skills in **Python**, along with experience in **Golang**, **Ruby**, and **Scala** for infrastructure-related tasks. Additionally, I have a solid background in version control with **Git**, artifact management using **Artifactory**, and CI/CD pipelines with **Jenkins**. 

I have successfully delivered high-performance applications in healthcare and finance, with hands-on expertise in **FastAPI** and **Django** for backend development. Additionally, my strong communication skills complement my technical expertise, ensuring effective team collaboration.
